text: Robert David Steele was a former CIA officer and a prominent figure in the fields of intelligence and information warfare. He became known for his critiques of the intelligence community and advocated for open-source intelligence. Steele also ran for political office and was involved in various initiatives focused on government transparency and accountability. He authored several books and articles discussing intelligence reform and the importance of open data. Steele was a controversial figure, with a blend of supporters and critics, particularly for his unconventional views on various issues. == References == Category:CIA people
title: Robert David Steele
